name: School Nightmare (DanDon95)
description:
My Game for Horror Jam - Isolation by TonysLand. 

It is my first ever published game. 

Trigger Warning: The game is a horror game and contains flashing light, such as contant that can be asssumed disturbing.

Open the .Rar file and copy the whole folder to your PC.

then out of the folder start the "HORROR GAME JAM Isolation" .EXE

Dont blame me for a bad game :D
